titles.title: Samuel Kelner Commission on Youth Authorization Act
To establish the Samuel Kelner Commission on Youth.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Education and the Workforce.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Education Reform.

committee.name: House Committee on Education and the Workforce

bill.summary: 4/26/2001--Introduced. Samuel Kelner Commission on Youth Authorization Act - Establishes the Samuel Kelner Commission on Youth to seek to reduce apathy among U.S. youth regarding the Nation's system of government by discussing and making policy recommendations on issues affecting U.S. youth, including issues in the subject areas of: (1) public education; (2) youth employment and wages; (3) higher education financing; and (4) youth drug abuse and violence.
